Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN PA Asset Lines Have Transferred Status But Are Missing In FA - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN PA Asset Lines Have Transferred Status But Are Missing In FA - Weekly
Source.Description: Assets costs are not interfacing to FA due to asset lines with transferred status in PA but missing in FA.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_PA_CAP_ASSET_LINES_MISSING_FA' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'project_id:' || s.project_id || ', project_asset_line_id:' || s.project_asset_line_id || ', project_asset_line_detail_id:' || s.project_asset_line_detail_id || ', project_asset_id:' || s.project_asset_id || ', task_id:' || s.task_id key_data FROM (SELECT p.project_id project_id, l.project_asset_line_id project_asset_line_id, l.project_asset_line_detail_id project_asset_line_detail_id, l.project_asset_id project_asset_id, l.task_id task_id FROM apps.pa_project_asset_lines_all l, apps.pa_projects_all p, apps.pa_project_types_all pt, apps.pa_project_statuses ps WHERE l.project_id = p.project_id AND trunc(l.creation_date) > SYSDATE - 7 AND l.transfer_status_code = 'T' AND p.project_type = pt.project_type AND p.org_id = pt.org_id AND pt.project_type_class_code = 'CAPITAL' AND p.project_status_code = ps.project_status_code AND ps.project_system_status_code <> 'CLOSED' AND l.transfer_rejection_reason = 'ASSET_NOT_POSTED' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM apps.fa_mass_additions ma WHERE ma.project_id = l.project_id AND ma.project_asset_line_id = l.project_asset_line_id AND ma.task_id = l.task_id UNION SELECT 1 FROM apps.fa_additions a, apps.fa_asset_invoices ai WHERE a.asset_id = ai.asset_id AND ai.project_asset_line_id = l.project_asset_line_id AND ai.project_id = l.project_id) AND rownum <= 6) s
